prompt: Create a ScriptableObject for storing weapon configuration data in Unity. The weapon should have a name, damage value, attack speed, range, and a sprite icon. Also show how to create and use it in a weapon system.
assertions: The ScriptableObject class has [CreateAssetMenu] attribute with fileName and menuName
Public fields or properties use PascalCase
Fields have [Tooltip] annotations describing their purpose
Numeric fields use [Range] attribute where bounds make sense
The class name follows PascalCase convention
An example is provided showing how to use the ScriptableObject in a MonoBehaviour
